data.md:MetaData: (Table 2) A compilation of the ratio of pristane to phytane and the marine versus terrestrial n-alkane as given by the ratio (n-C21 + n-C22)/(n-C28 + n-C29) at DSDP Legs 58 and 59 Holes
33 cores, 304 m cored, 9.5 m drilled, 50.6 % recovery
Geochemistry of carbon: Deep Sea Drilling Project Legs 58 and 59
